name: Forest in Danger (SeventyFour Productions)
description:
Story:

It's the 4th game in the Forest Firestick legacy, but this time you are not playing as him, this time....

You're rescuing him...

Also, you're a pig.

Controls:
WASD - Basic movements
SPACE - Jump
SHIFT - Run

Credits:
Programming - SeventyFour Productions
Graphics - SeventyFour Productions and Bro. Three
Music - Bro. Three
Story/dialouge - SeventyFour Productions and Bro. Three

Originally released on February the 11th, 2019
